channel.title: Testimonials – White Castle Roofing
channel.description: Trusted roofing contractor in Omaha, Lincoln and Grand Island

item.title: Larry Lewis
item.dc:creator: Kiley Eaton
item.description: I’m so happy with how the roof looks! The crew was wonderful! They were very respectful, hard-working, friendly, and did a really good job cleaning up.

item.title: Max and Sharon Thacker
item.dc:creator: Kiley Eaton
item.description: We want to let you know what an outstanding customer service experience this was for us through the entire process, from the initial evaluation, estimate, installation crew, to the completion of the project. Courteous, professional, and certainly a very hard-working crew! Most certainly, we will highly recommend White Castle!!! Thank you!

item.title: Angie and Matt T.
item.dc:creator: Kiley Eaton
item.description: I just wanted to send a thank-you to all who helped replace our roof and boards on the front window. It was all done in such a timely manner, and your entire crew was polite and respectful of our property. Wishing you all a safe roofing season.

item.title: Larry and Kathy Burklund
item.dc:creator: Kiley Eaton
item.description: Thank you! We are always impressed with White Castle in providing prompt, courteous, professional staff. It’s a pleasure doing business with such a company!

item.title: Marlin and Judith Johannes
item.dc:creator: Kiley Eaton
item.description: We would like to thank you so much for the wonderful job your company did in repairing our roof from the storm damage of May 9, 2016. Dustin did a fantastic job assessing the loss, working with the insurance adjuster, getting us on the calendar, and making sure everything was just as it had been […]

item.title: Debra R.
item.dc:creator: Kiley Eaton
item.description: Your workmen did such a good job cleaning up after putting on our new roof!

item.title: Jerry H.
item.dc:creator: Kiley Eaton
item.description: Thank you! The roof looks great. The workers were very friendly and did a great job!

item.title: Scott and Nancy S.
item.dc:creator: Kiley Eaton
item.description: Craig was awesome to have at our house – professional, kind, neat, friendly. We would highly recommend him and your company. Thank you!

item.title: Bill and Jane Weddle
item.dc:creator: Kiley Eaton
item.description: White Castle did both our roof and gutters and they are exceptional in customer service and crew quality, and are all around GREAT company to work with!

item.title: Deanna Bohl
item.dc:creator: Kiley Eaton
item.description: I appreciated coming home to seeing my home fixed so water won’t penetrate. Thanks so much for getting the small things addressed quickly. Your customer service, efficiency and professionalism are exactly why I chose White Castle Roofing to help me with the storm damage to my home.
